profile.name: WE Build With Bricks
profile.bio: Eco-minded and family-run LEGO reseller on BrickLink & Brick Owl. Where love for LEGO and family fun build a better brick shop.

sections.title: Our Stores
sections.description: Shop authentic LEGO sets and parts from our family-run stores on trusted marketplaces.

sections.title: Sustainable Packaging
sections.description: We partner with EcoEnclose for eco-friendly packaging solutions. Support sustainable shipping practices.

links.title: EcoEnclose
links.description: Sustainable packaging solutions.  Get a $20 coupon when you sign up with this link (and we will get one too!).

sections.title: Amazon Affiliate Links
sections.description: As an Amazon Associate, we earn from qualifying purchases. These are LEGO products we recommend and use ourselves.

links.title: Bambu A1 3D Printer with AMS Filament Dispenser
links.description: Our 3D printer of choice. We have been extremely happy with its performance and reliability. The AMS filament dispenser is a game changer for multicolor prints.

links.title: 3D Printer Filament - Black
links.description: This is the filament that we used to print all of the drawer dividers. It has held up very well and was easy to print with.

links.title: Iris Drawer Organizer - 64 Drawers
links.description: This is our most-used set of drawers. It comes with 64 small drawers, perfect for organizing most LEGO pieces.

links.title: Iris Drawer Organizer - 44 Drawers
links.description: This set of drawers comes with 32 small drawers and 12 larger drawers, perfect for organizing LEGO pieces.

links.title: Binder Clips - Black
links.description: Clips that fit on the front handle of the Iris drawers. We use them to mark which drawers have room for more pieces.

links.title: Binder Clips - Gold
links.description: Clips that fit on the front handle of the Iris drawers. We use them to mark which drawers have room for more pieces.

links.title: Binder Clips - Silver
links.description: Clips that fit on the front handle of the Iris drawers. We use them to mark which drawers have room for more pieces.

links.title: Clear Organization Boxes
links.description: Clear plastic boxes that our kids use to store and sort their Lego animals.

links.title: Clear Plastic Sorting Cups
links.description: Stackable cups that we use to sort LEGO pieces by color and type before putting them into our inventory.

links.title: Large Trays
links.description: Large trays that we use for tranporting stacks of cups and for sorting Lego pieces.

links.title: Small Sorting Trays
links.description: Smaller sorting trays that have a spout to pour out Lego pieces.

links.title: Sifting Sorter
links.description: Sorting tower that sifts Lego pieces and sorts them by size.

links.title: Drying Rack
links.description: We use a sweater drying rack with a fan pointed at it to dry our Lego pieces after washing them.

links.title: Document Camera
links.description: Camera that we use in conjunction with Lego recognition software to quickly identify, categorize, and inventory pieces.

links.title: Magnification Glasses with LED Lights and Multiple Lenes
links.description: For those small Lego pieces that we are trying to make sure are genuine Lego brand.

links.title: Magnifying Glass with LED Lights
links.description: Extremely useful for examining small Lego pieces when determining authenticity.

links.title: Postal Scale
links.description: Digital scale that we use for accurately weighing outgoing packages and Lego pieces.

links.title: Thermal Label Printer
links.description: This printer has worked wonderfully with our recyclable labels from EcoEnclose.
